turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I want to order two pizzas from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what size pizzas did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want both of them to be small.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and what did you want on them?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I wanted them to both be Meat Lovers.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: with extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want extra cheese for both pizzas?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and what kind of crust did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want both of them to be thick crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you want 2 small pizzas, both meat lovers with extra cheese and thick crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did i get that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $24.39 is the total. should i place the order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, the order has been placed. the pizzas will be ready for pick up in 25 mins.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you need my help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: awesome, enjoy.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.
